name: Youth Organisation ALEXIS Prilep
goal:
Our mission is the social and psychological well-being of lifelong learners.

Our work aims to help in the personal and social development of educators, youth workers and students for continuous learning and professional development.
interests: Budget, Education and training, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Taxation, Youth
euInitiatives: Our lifelong learning programme is addressing youth education workshops dedicated to young people and educators supporting the social and educational development, promoting social inclusion, diversity, and well-being.
